data.description:
Top Features:

1. AI Integration: The new AI companion can:

• Aid with EarthQuest matters
• Transcribe, listen, and communicate in 98 languages
• Offer precise details about surroundings
• Suggest and teleport you everywhere on Earth
• Remember past conversations
• Direct you to the Discord community
	
2. Realistic Sky Mode

• Realistic real-time lighting with day/night cycle and adaptive ambient sounds (birds chirping in the morning, crickets at night) with no performance impact.

3. Single and Multiplayer with Friends and Unique Avatars.

4. Customizable Flight Controls:

• Button Remapping
• Flight Controls range from Simple and Intuitive up to Complex Cinematic Flying in all 3 Dimensions.

5. Visual and Performance Upgrades:

• 2x Resolution
• Best Performance in the VR Travel Category (Similar to or better than PCVR Performance)

6. Terrain Quality:

• Similar to Google Earth on the Web by default, EarthQuest can achieve absolute photorealistic terrain by pushing the Terrain Memory to its limits based on your Headset’s power.

7. User Interface Design:

• Simple design for intuitive use.
• Single & Multiplayer Menus offer all possible settings, from music options to entering Mixed Reality as a Giant Flying Human.

8. Consistent Hand Tracking:

• Hand Tracking Rotation: Move your hands as fists similar to steering a car wheel.
• Fly like Superman by pointing your index finger in the direction of flight.
• Unrestricted menu interaction (Street View Mode has a dedicated button instead of a controller portal)

changelog.change_log:
v19.60 is OUT  !!

1. Updated Sea Level Height (meters and now converted in feet) !
2. Enabled support for multimodal (but not fully released) !
3. Optimized for Laying Down Mode (IT ACTUALLY FEELS LIKE FLYING)
4. Fixed some rare potential crashes
5. Now able to rotate with both thumbsticks on trigger & grip input modes.
6. Added 3 Amazing New Soundtracks Made by me using AI.
thanks for the suggestions ❤️

v19.62 is OUT  !!

1. Added Secondary Boost Button (Trigger) on Right Controller When using Thumbstick Input Mode !
2. Smoother Speed Change in Space when going higher or lower relative to earth !
3. Added Performance Warning to Terrain Loading Speed Setting.

thanks for the suggestions ❤️

Some code optimizations now allows 2 WHOLE NEW LEVELS of Terrain Quality Range ! ( yeah.. i said "Terrain Quality Range" ... no more "Mesh Quality Range" )
That doesn't mean it's going to run as well as on 75% for example, but not to worry since i've now added Performance Warnings !
Added Song Repeat Option !
Better, Reworked More Natural Automatic (height based) flight speed !
No more abrupt flight movements !
Each Button Press Now HAS To be in view in order to register as a press, soo.. no more accidental presses !
Better Microphone Clarity When Talking to AI !! (Better Voice Transcription)
Rewritten AI Info Instruction. (might give better responses but we'll have to wait and see for sure)

and fixed other small imperfections..
also renamed "Simultaneous Tile Loads" to "Terrain Loading Speed"
